t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

t: Amazon
s: We are a brand owner and enrolled in the Amazon Brand Registry. The contract for our authorised distributors forbids them from selling on Amazon. Despite having this agreement, there are a large number of 3rd-party sellers of our products on Amazon. We want to shut these 3rd-party sellers down. However, Amazon apparently has a policy of not intervening ...

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Sponsored Brands – Increase brand awareness | Amazon Ads
s: Sponsored ads on Amazon help build your brand and drive sales. Invest in long-term business growth by advertising your brand and products on Amazon.

t: Amazon’s Brand Protection Report

t: Amazon releases its first Brand Protection Report
s: May 10, 2021 - Our first-ever report shows Amazon’s progress in driving counterfeit to zero in our store.

t: Amazon releases its 2023 Brand Protection Report
s: June 17, 2024 - Our fourth annual report highlights four key areas helping to drive counterfeits to zero

t: Brand management: Guide to growing your brand on Amazon
s: March 26, 2025 - Building and maintaining a unique brand can help you differentiate products in a competitive market. But how do you manage your brand as you expand into new markets? Here are some ideas.

t: What You Must Know About Amazon Brand Protection
s: October 4, 2024 - Through advanced technology, machine learning and brand collaboration, Project Zero enables you to automatically remove counterfeit listings, identify and block unauthorized sellers, and prevent counterfeit products from entering the Amazon marketplace. Project Zero offers a self-service counterfeit removal tool, allowing you to take immediate action against infringing listings without waiting for Amazon’s intervention...

t: Resource Library - Trustworthy Shopping at Amazon
s: Browse our library of reports and research detailing Amazon’s efforts to create a trustworthy and safe shopping experience for our customers.

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 1 day ago - Amazon sells many products under its own brand names, including phone chargers, batteries, and diaper wipes. The AmazonBasics brand was introduced in 2009, and now features hundreds of product lines, including smartphone cases, computer mice, batteries, dumbbells, and dog crates.

t: Amazon Transparency: Counterfeit and brand protection
s: Transparency protects your brand and customers from counterfeits by ensuring that every unit shipped is authentic. Learn more about Amazon Transparency.

t: Amazon Brand Management
s: May 26, 2023 - Amazon Brand Management for major global brands. Delivering the best brand experience, whilst fully optimising Amazon and increasing ROI.
